pages.question: How did you feel during the task?
pages.text: Please rate each term below from 1 - 7 (1 being 'Not at all' and 7 being 'Very much')

pages.question: Think about the task you just preformed. For each of the following statements indicate how true it is for you.
pages.text: Please rate each term below from 1 - 7 (1 being 'Not at all true' and 7 being 'Very true')

terms.term: I felt a connection to the people shown in the photographs
I understood how the people in the photographs were feeling
I was able to put myself 'in the shoes' of those depicted in the photographs
I was able to relate to those depicted in the photographs
I cared about what happened to those shown in the photographs
I thought about things that are important to me
I gained new insights about the world
I thought about meaningful events in the world
I thought about myself in relation to others
I enjoyed doing this activity very much
The task was fun to do.
I thought this was a boring activity
The task did not hold my attention at all
I would describe this activity as very interesting
I thought about how much I enjoyed the task
